ðŸ“š Insert Node at Head

By Amir Charkhi | AI Tech Institute

ðŸŽ¯ Purpose

Master inserting nodes at the head of a linked list - a constant time O(1) operation that's simpler than tail insertion.

ðŸ“‹ Problem Statement

Given the pointer to the head node and an integer data, create a new node and insert it at the head.

Example:
Head: 16 -> 13 -> NULL, data: 15
Result: 15 -> 16 -> 13 -> NULL

ðŸ’¡ Solution

def insertNodeAtHead(llist, data): new_node = SinglyLinkedListNode(data) new_node.next = llist return new_node

Time: O(1) - Constant time! | Space: O(1)
